com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.shared_services

Interface ICrudService<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the bean type served by this repository
    All Superinterfaces:
    IDataWriteService<O>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICrudService.IReadOnlyCrudService<O>, IManagementCrudService<O>, IManagementCrudService.IReadOnlyManagementCrudService<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrudServiceUtils.ReadOnlyCrudService, CrudServiceUtils.ReadOnlyManagementCrudService, MockManagementCrudService

    public interface ICrudService<O>
extends IDataWriteService<O>
    A generic interface to an "object" datastore with a "MongoDB like" interface
    Author:
    acp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ICrudService.Cursor<O> 
      static interface  ICrudService.IBatchSubservice<O>
      A more efficiently batch interface that may or may not be implemented - version supporting deduplication on insert
      static interface  ICrudService.IMetaModel
      A table-level interface to the CRUD store using the open MetaModel library Can be retrieved using ICrudService.getUnderlyingPlatformDriver(IMetaModel.class, Optional.empty()
      static interface  ICrudService.IReadOnlyCrudService<O>

    • Method Detail

      • getFilteredRepo

        ICrudService<O> getFilteredRepo(String authorization_fieldname,
                                Optional<AuthorizationBean> client_auth,
                                Optional<ProjectBean> project_auth)
        Returns a copy of the CRUD service that is filtered based on the client (user) and project rights
        Parameters:
        authorization_fieldname - the fieldname in the bean that determines where the per-bean authorization is held
        client_auth - Optional specification of the user's access rights
        project_auth - Optional specification of the projects's access rights
        Returns:
        The filtered CRUD repo

      • readOnlyVersion

        default ICrudService<O> readOnlyVersion(boolean is_read_only)
        Returns a possibly read only version of the CRUD service. The interface is the same, but writable calls will exception.
        Parameters:
        is_read_only - - whether to return the read only version or not
        Returns:
        the possibly read only version of the CRUD service

      • readOnlyVersion

        default ICrudService.IReadOnlyCrudService<O> readOnlyVersion()
        Returns a definitely read only version of the CRUD service. The interface is the same, but writable calls will exception.
        Returns:
        the definitely read only version of the CRUD service

      • storeObject

        CompletableFuture<Supplier<Object>> storeObject(O new_object,
                                                boolean replace_if_present)
        Stores the specified object in the database, optionally failing if it is already present If the "_id" field of the object is not set then it is assigned
        Specified by:
        storeObject in interface IDataWriteService<O>
        Parameters:
        new_object -
        replace_if_present - if true then any object with the specified _id is overwritten
        Returns:
        A future containing the _id (filled in if not present in the object) - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • storeObjects

        CompletableFuture<scala.Tuple2<Supplier<List<Object>>,Supplier<Long>>> storeObjects(List<O> new_objects,
                                                                                    boolean replace_if_present)
        Specified by:
        storeObjects in interface IDataWriteService<O>
        Parameters:
        objects - - a list of objects to insert
        replace_if_present - if true then duplicate objects will update the existing ones, if not the behavior is undefined (in terms of error/success, and how many other non-dup objects are stored)
        Returns:
        A future containing the list of _ids (filled in if not present in the object), and the number of docs retrieved - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • optimizeQuery

        CompletableFuture<Boolean> optimizeQuery(List<String> ordered_field_list)
        Registers that you wish to optimize specific queries
        Parameters:
        ordered_field_list - a list of the fields in the query
        Returns:
        a future describing if the optimization was successfully completed - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • deregisterOptimizedQuery

        boolean deregisterOptimizedQuery(List<String> ordered_field_list)
        Inform the system that a specific query optimization is no longer required
        Parameters:
        ordered_field_list - a list of the fields in the query
        Returns:
        whether this optimization was registered in the first place

      • getObjectBySpec

        CompletableFuture<Optional<O>> getObjectBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> unique_spec)
        Returns the object (in optional form to handle its not existing) given a simple object template that contains a unique search field (but other params are allowed)
        Parameters:
        unique_spec - A specification (must describe at most one object) generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        Returns:
        A future containing an optional containing the object, or Optional.empty() - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • getObjectBySpec

        CompletableFuture<Optional<O>> getObjectBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> unique_spec,
                                               List<String> field_list,
                                               boolean include)
        Returns the object (in optional form to handle its not existing) given a simple object template that contains a unique search field (but other params are allowed)
        Parameters:
        unique_spec - A specification (must describe at most one object) generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        field_list - list of fields to return, supports "." nesting
        include - - if true, the field list is to be included; if false, to be excluded
        Returns:
        A future containing an optional containing the object, or Optional.empty() - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • getObjectsBySpec

        CompletableFuture<ICrudService.Cursor<O>> getObjectsBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> spec)
        Returns the list of objects specified by the spec (all fields returned)
        Parameters:
        spec - A specification generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        Returns:
        A future containing a (possibly empty) list of Os - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • getObjectsBySpec

        CompletableFuture<ICrudService.Cursor<O>> getObjectsBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> spec,
                                                           List<String> field_list,
                                                           boolean include)
        Returns the list of objects/order/limit specified by the spec. Note that the resulting object should be run within a try-with-resources or read fully.
        Parameters:
        spec - A specification generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        field_list - List of fields to return, supports "." nesting
        include - - if true, the field list is to be included; if false, to be excluded
        Returns:
        A future containing a (possibly empty) list of Os - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • countObjectsBySpec

        CompletableFuture<Long> countObjectsBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> spec)
        Counts the number of objects specified by the spec (all fields returned)
        Parameters:
        spec - A specification generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        Returns:
        A future containing the number of matching objects - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • updateObjectById

        CompletableFuture<Boolean> updateObjectById(Object id,
                                            CrudUtils.UpdateComponent<O> update)
        Updates the specified object
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the object to update
        update - A specification to update the object (UpdateOperator.unset with field "" deletes the object)
        Returns:
        a future describing if the update was successful - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • updateObjectBySpec

        CompletableFuture<Boolean> updateObjectBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> unique_spec,
                                              Optional<Boolean> upsert,
                                              CrudUtils.UpdateComponent<O> update)
        Updates the specified object
        Parameters:
        unique_spec - A specification (must describe at most one object) generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        upsert - if specified and true then inserts the object if it doesn't exist
        update - A specification to update the object (UpdateOperator.unset with field "" deletes the object)
        Returns:
        a future describing if the update was successful - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • updateObjectsBySpec

        CompletableFuture<Long> updateObjectsBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> spec,
                                            Optional<Boolean> upsert,
                                            CrudUtils.UpdateComponent<O> update)
        Updates the specified object
        Parameters:
        spec - A specification generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        upsert - if specified and true then inserts the object if it doesn't exist
        update - A specification to update the object (UpdateOperator.unset with field "" deletes the object)
        Returns:
        a future describing the number of objects updated - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • updateAndReturnObjectBySpec

        CompletableFuture<Optional<O>> updateAndReturnObjectBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> unique_spec,
                                                           Optional<Boolean> upsert,
                                                           CrudUtils.UpdateComponent<O> update,
                                                           Optional<Boolean> before_updated,
                                                           List<String> field_list,
                                                           boolean include)
        Updates the specified object, returning the updated version
        Parameters:
        unique_spec - A specification (must describe at most one object) generated by CrudUtils.allOf(...) (all fields must be match) or CrudUtils.anyOf(...) (any fields must match) together with extra fields generated by .withAny(..), .withAll(..), present(...) or notPresent(...)
        upsert - if specified and true then inserts the object if it doesn't exist
        update - A specification to update the object (UpdateOperator.unset with field "" deletes the object)
        before_updated - if specified and "true" then returns the object _before_ it is modified
        field_list - List of fields to return, supports "." nesting
        include - - if true, the field list is to be included; if false, to be excluded
        Returns:
        a future containing the object, if found (or upserted) - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the object to update
        Returns:

      • deleteObjectsBySpec

        CompletableFuture<Long> deleteObjectsBySpec(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<O> spec)
        Deletes the specific object
        Parameters:
        A - specification that must be initialized via CrudUtils.anyOf(...) and then the desired fields added via .exists()
        Returns:
        a future describing the number of objects updated - accessing the future will also report on errors via ExecutionException

      • secured

        default ICrudService<O> secured(IServiceContext service_context,
                                AuthorizationBean auth_bean)
        Returns a secured version of the CRUD service. THIS HAS NO DEFAULT IMPLEMENTATION (since there's no obvious context to what this means, unlike say a management bean)
        Parameters:
        service_context - - the system service context
        auth_bean - - the authorization context of the calling user
        Returns:
        the secured version of the CRUD service
